content: create a stunning chevron lace wrap with this easy crochet pattern the pattern includes detailed instructions for crocheting a beautiful shawl or wrap that features a chevron and lace design this one-piece reversible and seamless pattern is worked flat in a sideways manner resulting in a lovely rectangular wrap the pattern is available in written format with a chart and video tutorial for assistance **unique features-** easy crochet pattern suitable for all skill levels reversible and seamless construction for a clean finish includes written pattern chart and video tutorial for guidance **materials needed-** hook 5mm us size 8 0 yarn fingering weight 800-1000 yards
